segments.text: I'm going to the shops in a minute . What do we need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're okay for vegetables but we should stock up on meat . Can you go to the butcher's and get some veal and some beef ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . We also need bread , so I'll go to the baker's . I'll get some vol au vents for Victor's birthday bash on Friday . We'll need balloons for that too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better visit the supermarket then . We'll need some other things for the party . Get some vanilla ice cream , some butter and some vinegar and twelve bottles of beer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . The library's beside the baker's . I'd better take back the videos we borrowed last week . They're overdue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye ! I'll be back before seven .
segments.speaker: S1
